title: Go Ball Watch Face

Catch 'em all, Trainer ball style.
Smooth & cool animation.

comments: Doesn't work Does not show in andriod wear app or on my lg g watch, a day later and still not loaded.
It was great until it shows up on watch than disappears. Wish it stayed like it used to.
